message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $15,000 for it. What do you think?

Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. Could we possibly negotiate the price down to $12,000? I believe this would be more in line with what I am able to afford at this time.
